name: Vechoe
overview:
Vechoe is the leading music social network that lets artists and bands upload there music albums,videos,photos and blogs so that they can get recognised.

Vechoe is the music social network that enables artists and bands who wish to echoe there music across the world. A combination of uploading music albums, singles, photos,videos , a Vstore and blogs make it an ideal place to artists and bands to get noticed and hired for concerts and clubs. The social network is well integrated into all social networks , stemming far over 150 which enables musicians to be promoted and echoed through the internet. Vechoe does not only create a platform but has been integregated with twitter meaning every action whether it is if you have uploaded a new album , photo or website , maybe just updated your status , either way Vechoe makes sure that all your news fans and followers know about your movement.

Vechoe provides a facebook connect enabling your statuses and actions also to be updated and followed.
